text: Atahpara (tara abhisampata peyechila [1]) tadera angikara bhangera jan'ya, allahara ayatasamuhera sathe kuphari karara jan'ya, nabiganake an'yayabhabe hatya karara jan'ya ebam â€˜amadera hrdaya acchaditaâ€™ tadera e uktira jan'ya. Baram tadera kupharira karane allaha tara upara mohara mere diyechena. Sutaram kebala alpa sankhyaka loka'i imana anabe
